Text: Oh man..Not again this minus bullshit fucked-heads. Arrhhh

yawn - 20/40 - says more about the stupid haters than it does about you.

DEAR IDIOTS: If you think the size is too small for you (quality wise) - WHY DO YOU EVEN COME HERE?

You get things wrong. It's not about loonies, I couldn't care less for getting minuses from personification of minuses.

It is, totally, about full swarms (at least hundredth of people) on all my torrent this morning - who have loaded my torrents, dozens have finished downloads - but calmly watched how minus rating grows.

It about so called "normal" people, to whom I made perfectly clear what would happen if they allow to be over-voiced by raging and rabid lunatics.

It's about dignity too, if someone knows full meaning of that word.

@doyll: "cannot see how any "normal" person could honestly post a minus on your work"

No, they are - mute. That's what I wrote. 

"Minuses" always came from mentally ill persons, no one sane could not have anything less than appreciation only for work of all uploaders. For sake-of-god, I bought my connection in 1998. but never ever even crossed my mind to write "motherfucker" to some stranger.

But, number of normal people rapidly goes lower.
